name: SurrealSkin 16HR Soft Setting Spray
about: What it is:An alcohol-free, fragrance-free & butane-free ultra-fine hydrating mist to set makeup for up to 16 hours for a natural finish and barely-there feel..Finish:Natural.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:-Hyaluronic Acid: helps with immediate & all-day hydration..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It  is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This ultra-fine mist evenly coats makeup without disrupting it with clinically proven all-day hydration. The formula layers beautifully while softly setting makeup to create a naturally-lived-in, finish. SurrealSkin Soft Setting Spray makes makeup look flawless and is alcohol and fragrance-free..Clinical Results:In a consumer-panel study of 30 participants:
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Provides immediate and all-day hydration..-Vitamin C: Has antioxidant properties..-Niacinamide: Visibly evens skin tone...Water/Aqua, PVP, Phenoxyethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Caffeine, Glycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Hippophae Rhamnoides Extract, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Vaccinium Corymbosum (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Ceramide EOP.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-This ultra-fine mist can be applied close to the skin without disrupting makeup..-As a last step to your makeup routine mist it all over the face a few times to coat the skin evenly.u200b u200b..Mariou2019s tip:.-Hold the bottle about six inches away from your face, spray in three even lines.Let it dry for a few seconds.

reviews.review_text: The Surrealskin Soft Setting Spray by Makeup By Mario is  a great long lasting  ( 16 hour wear )  product which I can appreciate .   Designed to set makeup for up to 16 hours, this alcohol-free, ultra-fine mist delivers exactly what it promises: a flawless, long-lasting finish with a natural, barely-there feel.   The mist is incredibly fine and evenly coats your makeup without disturbing it, which is key for maintaining a smooth, polished look.  What sets this spray apart is its ability to hydrate all day long which I loved !!!   . Unlike some setting sprays that can leave skin feeling tight or dry, the Surrealskin spray keeps your skin feeling soft and moisturized, making it perfect for those with drier skin typesu2026. It leaves a beautiful, lived-in finish  on my skin that looked and felt natural and not overdone.  The formula is also fragrance-free and alcohol-free, so itu2019s gentle on sensitive skin.   Whether you're wearing makeup for a full day or a night out, this setting spray ensures that your look stays fresh and radiant, without needing touch-ups.   Overall, it's a fantastic product for anyone looking for hydration and long-lasting wear in their makeup routine. :)

If youu2019re looking for a setting spray that enhances your makeup while keeping it in place all day, I highly recommend giving this one a try.
